title: So uhh the devourer on yi yeah?
body:
He attacks 4 times when the shadow copies his double strike

thoughts?

replies.body: No. First off, the "shadow" attacks of the devourer only apply on-hit effects, they don't actually deal any damage themselves. Secondly, according to the wiki page, it counts BOTH attacks of Yi's *Double Strike* as a single attack.

Nice bit of info.


i saw a while back some issues with vayne and ekko passive stacks.. im wondering if thats still an issue?
so it applies once for the shadow?
